derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from French, from Latin familia 'family'

entry.tran: 家庭（或家族）的;家庭(或家族)特有的
entry.def: Familial means relating to families in general, or typical of a family.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or having the characteristics of a family;
2. tending to occur among members of a family usually by heredity;
